text.data-name: A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine.
text.tspan: A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my
entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring
which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and
feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was
created for the bliss of souls like mine.
